response.overview: MYRTEZA BLUE is the intimate portrait of Graeme Myrteza — a once multi-generational farmer, now recognized Australian landscape artist. Filmmaker Eren Besiroglu chronicles Myrteza through his meditations on artistic exploration, evoking Myrteza to ask the question: ‘Why did I start painting at 60?
response.tagline: A portrait of Graeme Myrteza — whose passion awakens through the loss of his son, and contemplates his artistic legacy.
response.title: Myrteza Blue
